droplets-circled-number-description: Number in a circle with customisable colour
bs-distributionconnector-default-user-ap: The workflow 'User approval' for page '$1' has finished
bs-distributionconnector-default-documen: The workflow 'Expert document control' for page '$1' has finished
bs-distributionconnector-pref-eventbus-e: The defined services for extension 'EventBus' that propagates state changes (edit, move, delete, revision visibility, etc.) to a RESTful event service, providing consumers of the service with the means of tracking changes to MediaWiki content
bs-distributionconnector-videodropletins: Add a description under the video. For line breaks, use '&#10'

To set the size of the video you can use the format 'width x height' in pixels. If the height is not provided it will be calculated automatically from the width. If you want to set the height you have to indicate this with 'x'.
Examples: 480, 480x320,x320 - for a width of 480 and a height of 320
